text: addressed. 14.16 Part 2 sets out how this process is to be followed on site allocations. The council has undertaken a high-level design-led site capacity assessment for allocated sites, which has led to an understanding of the design principles, indicative capacities and appropriate heights that will be considered suitable on allocated sites. Proposals that conform to these capacities and heights, and meet the other principles set out in the site allocations, will be supported. PEOPLE, PLACES AND SPACES
